sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const style = { color: "black", fontFamily: "Trattatello", width: "auto", padding: "0px", float: "left" }; const tableStyle = { color: "black", padding: "1px", fontFamily: "Trattatello" }; const imgClass = { width: "50px", height: "auto" }; const hourlyTable = { color: "black", border: "1px solid black", padding: "8px", fontFamily: "Trattatello", fontSize: "15px", width: "auto", display: "inline-table", marginLeft: "40%", top: "-100px" }; const row = { marginLeft:"-5px", marginRight:"-5px", } const column = { float: "left", width: "50%", padding: "5px", } export const Forecast = ({forecast}) => { let arr = forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].hour arr = [arr[0], arr[3], arr[6], arr[9], arr[12], arr[15], arr[18], arr[21]] return (

Today's weather in {forecast.location.name}, {forecast.location.region}

{forecast.current.condition.text}

Sunrise: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.sunrise}Sunset: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.sunset}Moonrise: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.moonrise}Moonset: {forecast.forecast.forecastday[0].astro.moonset}
{arr.map(hour => ( ))}
Time Weather Temperature(Feels Like) Humidity Wind Speed (MPH)
{hour.time} {hour.temp_f}({hour.feelslike_f}) F {hour.humidity}% {hour.wind_mph}
) };
